price: 58. Dheh: Deeqda Alle (Islaamka) iyo Naxariistiisa (Qur’aanka) - arrinkani ha ku farxeen, isagaa uga khayr badan waxay isu keenaan (oo maal ah).
arabic: قُلۡ بِفَضۡلِ ٱللَّهِ وَبِرَحۡمَتِهِۦ فَبِذَٰلِكَ فَلۡيَفۡرَحُواْ هُوَ خَيۡرٞ مِّمَّا يَجۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul bifaḍli al-lahi wabiraḥmatihi fabidhālika falyafraḥū huwa khayrun mimmā yajmaʿūna
